Name: jc
Brief: Jump if carry/below/not above or equal, CF=1
This jump is taken if the last arithmetic operation generated a carry or required a borrow. After a CMP it is taken if the unsigned destination is smaller than the unsigned source.

Name: jnc
Brief: Jump if not(carry/below) or if above or equal, CF=0

Name: ja
Brief: Jump if above/not below or equal, CF=ZF=0

Name: jna
Brief: Jump if below or equal/not above, CF=1 or ZF=1

Name: jl
Brief: Jump if less/not greater or equal, SF!=OF

Name: jnl
Brief: Jump if greater or equal/not less, SF==OF

Name: jle
Brief: Jump if less or equal/not greater, ZF=1 or SF!=OF

Name: jg
Brief: Jump if greater/not less or equal, ZF=0 && SF==OF
